title: The Masters of Willowhurst - Part I
description: Talbot Moreau has always had a taste for tall, statuesque black men. Being the son and heir of a plantation owner, he has never been denied anything. Until now. After being forced into an arranged marriage, he begins to take a liking to his wife's slave. Isaac is literate, intelligent, and handsome. The only person in the world that Talbot wants but is unable to get.
author: Gideon Rathbone
